Report.SQLvalue: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(FE.PRODUCT_ID) AS "# of Impressions", PRO.PARTNUM AS "Part Number", PREF.NAME AS "Product Name", PREF.SHORT_DESCRIPTION AS "Product Description" FROM WCA.FACT_EVENT FE, WCA.PRODUCT_REF PREF, WCA.PERIOD P, WCA.PRODUCT PRO WHERE PREF.PRODUCT_ID = FE.PRODUCT_ID AND (P.PER_ID = FE.PER_ID and PRO.PRODUCT_ID NOT IN (SELECT COALESCE(INTEGER(PARAM.PARAM_VALUE),-9999) FROM WCA.PARAMETERS PARAM WHERE PARAM.PARAM_TYPE ='PRODUCT_ID_DEFAULT')) and P.CALENDAR_DATE >= $DB_TIMESTAMP_FUNC({StartDate})$ and P.CALENDAR_DATE <= $DB_TIMESTAMP_FUNC({EndDate})$ AND FE.EVENT_TYPE_ID = 2 AND PRO.PRODUCT_ID = FE.PRODUCT_ID AND PREF.LANGUAGE_ID IN ( SELECT INTEGER (PR.PARAM_VALUE) FROM WCA.PARAMETERS PR WHERE PR.PARAM_TYPE='REPORT_LANGUAGE') AND FE.STORE_ID IN {storeent_id} GROUP BY PRO.PARTNUM,PREF.SHORT_DESCRIPTION, PREF.NAME ORDER BY {sortBy} {sortOrder}

userDefinedParameters.THStyle: TH { font-family : Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size : 10pt; color : #565665; font-weight : bold; }
userDefinedParameters.TDStyle: TD { font-family : Verdana, Arial, Helvetica; font-size : 9pt; color : Black; }
